def is_remote_with_dvd(remote:item):
    # Determine if the remote controls the DVD player
    symbol dvd_remote = exists player: item: is_dvd_player(player) and controls(remote, player)
    return dvd_remote

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote: item: is_remote_control(remote) and is_remote_with_dvd(remote):
            # If we have already found the remote control for the DVD player, approach it
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and is_remote_with_dvd(remote)
            achieve close_char(char, remote)

        else:
            # Check all remotes that have not been visited
            foreach remote: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
                    observe(remote, "Check if this remote controls the DVD player")

def is_remote_with_dvd(remote:item):
    # Determine if the remote controls the DVD player
    symbol dvd_remote = exists player: item: is_dvd_player(player) and is_remote_control(remote)
    return dvd_remote

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote: item: is_remote_control(remote) and is_remote_with_dvd(remote):
            # If we have already found the remote control for the DVD player, approach it
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and is_remote_with_dvd(remote)
            achieve close_char(char, remote)

        else:
            # Check all remotes that have not been visited
            foreach remote: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
                    observe(remote, "Check if this remote controls the DVD player")

behavior turn_on_dvd_player_with_remote(remote:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        achieve close_char(char, dvd_player)
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        turn_on_dvd_player_with_remote(remote, dvd_player)

behavior turn_on_dvd_player_using_remote(dvd_player: item, remote_control: item):
    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, dvd_player) # Face the DVD player
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control) # Ensure the character is close to the remote
        observe(remote_control, "Find the power button on the remote control") # Check the power but
ton status on the remote
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Ensure the DVD player is turned on

        # Select the remote control
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Select the DVD player
        turn_on_dvd_player_using_remote(dvd_player, remote_control) # Achieve the goal of turning on
 the DVD player

behavior turn_on_dvd_player(player:item, remote:item):
    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, player)
        achieve facing_char(char, remote)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote:item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        bind player:item where:
            is_dvd_player(player)
        turn_on_dvd_player(player, remote)

behavior turn_on_dvd_player_using_remote_control(remote:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, dvd_player)
        # Face the DVD player to operate it with the remote control
        achieve has_switch(dvd_player)
        # Ensure the DVD player has an onoff switch
        achieve is_off(dvd_player)
        # Ensure the DVD player is currently off
        achieve_once inhand(remote)
        # Hold the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        # Select the remote control for the DVD player
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Select the DVD player
        turn_on_dvd_player_using_remote_control(remote, dvd_player)
